CustomField.formula: IF(iMCNRRProduct__c = TRUE && iMCProduct__c = TRUE, TotalPrice, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c, "One Time Event"), New_Sales_Price__c * New_Quantity__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c, "Pay Per Use"), New_Sales_Price__c * New_Quantity__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Unit_Type__c , "Ancillary"), New_Sales_Price__c * New_Quantity__c, 0))))
CustomField.label: Product NRR
